import React from 'react'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import Breadcrumb from 'react-bootstrap/Breadcrumb'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import { ToastContainer } from 'react-toastify'; import Spinner from 'react-bootstrap/Spinner' class ConfirmationPage extends React.Component { render() { return (
{this.props.loading ?
:
Subscription Options Payment Confirm
Selected Subscription: 6 Months Subscription
USD Per GB: {this.props.priceUsdPerGb}$
Total Amount:  { this.props.isUpfront == 0 ?
{this.props.amount}$
:
{this.props.amount}$ {this.props.amount * 0.9}$
}
Upfront Payment: {this.props.isUpfront ? 'Yes' : 'No'}
}
) } } export default withRouter(ConfirmationPage);
